EmailTemplate.name: Project Memo Approval Division Chief
EmailTemplate.subject: Project Memo Approval Division Chief
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Please find attached the CRADA Approval Memo regarding the proposed project with {!Agreement__c.Agreement_Partner__c}, titled {!Agreement__c.Agreement_Title__c}. According to NIST Policy, each CRADA project requires approval from the relevant Division Chief and the Director of the Operating Unit. If you approve the project, please sign next to your name at the top of the attachment, and reply to this email with a copy of the Memo. If you have any proposed changes, please feel free to contact {!Agreement__c.Agreement_Officer__c}.
Thank you.
